content.raw:
> These tutorials are all listed as Gazebo version 1.9+, would they work with all these Gazebo versions? 

At least with ros_wrapper_version tutorial my approach is to maintain in the same document support all the supported gazebo versions and ROS releases. I think that others are following this, like installing and others are more agnostic about gazebo or ROS versions, like roslaunch or plugins. 1.9+ is probably too old, but 2.2+ should be fine.
content.html:
These tutorials are all listed as Gazebo version 1.9+, would they work with all these Gazebo versions?

At least with ros_wrapper_version tutorial my approach is to maintain in the same document support all the supported gazebo versions and ROS releases. I think that others are following this, like installing and others are more agnostic about gazebo or ROS versions, like roslaunch or plugins. 1.9+ is probably too old, but 2.2+ should be fine.
